gears.sidescroller.world.tileMaps

Class OutOfBoundsEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • gears.sidescroller.world.tileMaps.OutOfBoundsEvent

  • public class OutOfBoundsEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    An OutOfBoundsEvent is fired whenever a MobileWorldObject passes the bounds of a TileMap. This is used by Level to detect when the Player leaves their Area, and should therefore transition to the next one. I may later change this to where Areas are aware of the Level they occupy, and can therefore handle transitions without listeners.
